titles.title: CB 76 You Are Lord of Creation

properties.copyright: Â©1984 New Spring (Brentwood-Benson Music Publishing Co.)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
YOU ARE LORD OF CREATION
And Lord of my life, Lord of the land and the sea.
You were Lord of the heavens before there was
time,
And Lord of all lords You will be.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We bow down, and we worship You, Lord (3x)
Lord of all lords You will be.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You are King of creation and King of my life, King
of the land and the sea.
You were King of the heavens before there was
time,
And King of all kings You will be.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
We bow down, and we crown You the King (3x)
King of all kings You will be.
